author: Anonym
title: "Warning sign": Panic in Ma'ale Adumim after Palestinian workers entered the industrial zone without inspection | Israel today - The Limited Times
text:
Individual security guards, most of them untrained as fighters, in front of hundreds of Palestinian workers.
The location: the industrial area at the entrance to Mishor Adumim, which suffered an attack just a few months ago.
This is what one of the main industrial areas in Judea and Samaria looks like every day.
Yesterday, in the early hours of the morning, a serious security incident occurred at this point of friction.
Hundreds of Palestinians flocked into the compound without any checks.
The soldiers of the standby squad, who arrived on the field on their own accord and without any order, stood aside and rubbed their eyes in astonishment.
The guard post in Mishor Adumim, after the attack at the end of December,
The Ma'ale Adumim municipality issued a clarification and claimed that it was a one-off glitch: "This is a misleading video, in which Palestinians were seen breaking through a barrier and entering the industrial zone without inspection. As a result, shock and panic reigned throughout the city."
According to them, the load on the checkpoint "came as a result of an electrical fault at the check-in terminal. Everyone who enters Meshar Adumim and Ma'al Adumim goes through a comprehensive check, and everything is in order."
On the municipal Facebook page, they asked for reassurance and clarified that "only 50 workers, all with an entry permit, walked to their workplace and were stopped by the security department 100 meters from the entrance barrier."
Attack in Maale Adumim (archive), photo: Oren Ben Hakon
However, eyewitnesses are convinced that the municipality played down the omission, in an attempt to curb criticism of it.
"Everyone is trying to protect themselves because they don't want panic.
In practice, hundreds of undocumented Palestinians entered Mishar Adumim, and the members of the standby squad were almost trampled," said one of those present at the event.
An attack every few months
The allegations raise glaring question marks regarding the municipality's conduct regarding the entry of workers into the city, against the background of the security history in the area in recent months.
In August, a cleaning worker at the municipal community center, Mahand Almazareh, opened fire on passers-by near a mall in the city. Six Israelis were injured before he was neutralized. During the interrogation, he said that he was not feeling well, so the resident of the city drove him home. There he armed himself, and then returned without being checked. into Maale Adumim.
The Palestinian workers enter the inspection, yesterday, photo: use according to Section 27 A of the Copyright Law
A month ago, another attack was carried out, in the exact place where the hundreds of workers flocked yesterday.
A terrorist stabbed a security guard at the guard post.
He was shot, injured and later took control of a weapon and tried to use it to shoot the security guards.
After the serious attack last August, the municipality announced that every worker who comes to work in the city - will undergo a check using a magnetometer.
It was also decided that workers will be prohibited from entering with a bag, and that all bags in their possession will be checked before entering.
But statements are separate and reality is separate.
Although a magnetometer was placed at the entrance to the city, but according to the residents, the terminal has been hacked, and it does not include a mirror device and is not adapted to deal with hundreds of Palestinians, so the checking is not optimal.
"They go through the magnetometer, but move the bags and bags aside. It's a joke," say eyewitnesses.
Urgent letter to the Minister of Defense
The Minister of Settlements and National Missions, Orit Struck, wrote an urgent letter to the Minister of Defense Yoav Galant, so that he would address the failure that occurred at the entrance to Mishor Adumim at the upcoming cabinet meeting.
"According to evidence from the field, the security check system (terminal) is far from being normal," she wrote and demanded to examine the multiple claims heard from the field.
stroke
Will an inspection team be established for the event?, Photo: Oren Ben Hakon
Strock requests answers from Galant regarding the status of the inspection systems in all the industrial areas where Palestinian workers work;
How does the system intend to prevent a similar invasion in the future, and if an investigation team will be established for the incident.
"This serious incident, which has ended for the time being with no casualties, must be a warning sign for the future," she said.
The Ma'ale Adumim municipality denied the evidence: "The security situation has been upgraded in recent times, especially with the opening of the inspection terminal about two months ago. The inspection is done for each employee personally, the bags are opened and the contents are checked."
The municipality claimed that "the security system at the site provides the best and maximum response, especially in the current period", and emphasized that the security system and security patrols at the site will even be increased.

author: @OrneCombattante
title: "En grand danger" : dans l'Orne, quel avenir pour ces trois Ehpad menacés de fermeture ?
text:
L’association Marguerite Guérin lance un cri d’alarme . Gérante de trois Ehpad privés associatifs à but non lucratif, à Athis-de-l’Orne , à Briouze et à Longny-au-Perche ( Orne ), elle voit ses comptes plonger dans la zone rouge avec inquiétude.
« On est en grand danger. Si cela continue ainsi, l’association va disparaître  », prévoient Nathalie Martin, directrice générale, Gérald Julie, directeur administratif financier, et Julie Roullois, adjointe de direction. « On se bat pour maîtriser au mieux nos dépenses , mais on le vit plutôt mal. Il faut sauver nos établissements, c’est notre responsabilité  ».
À lire aussi
Doyenne de Flers, Marguerite fête ses 111 ans et vient tout juste de rentrer à l’Ehpad Des dépenses qui bondissent pour les Ehpad Comment l’association est-elle arrivée dans cette situation ? « Avant le covid , nos établissements n’étaient pas en difficulté  », soutient la directrice générale. Suite à la pandémie, les coûts partent à la hausse : énergie , alimentation , contrat de maintenance, salaires…
Nos dotations n’ont pas évolué au même rythme que nos dépenses. On subit l’inflation.
Nathalie Martin, directrice générale Conséquence, l’association se retrouve avec des déficits à combler . « Avec notre expérience dans le domaine de l’expertise comptable, on sait ce que représente une sortie de trésorerie, on voit les prévisionnels… » Et l’horizon semble bouché.
À lire aussi
17 ans plus tard, cette commune de l’Orne veut corriger une erreur : nouvel imprévu Pas de rentabilité demandée Ces trois Ehpad privés associatifs à but non lucratif se situent à Athis-de-l’Orne (Le Sacré Cœur), à Briouze (Résidence Notre-Dame) et à Longny-au-Perche (La Providence), dans l’Orne , et représentent 260 résidents et près de 160 salariés.
« On est dans une démarche non lucrative, on n’a pas de rentabilité à avoir. L’objectif n’est pas de faire des bénéfices, mais d’être à l’équilibre », explique la direction générale de l’association.
On ne choisit pas nos résidents par rapport à leurs portefeuilles.
Gérald Julie, directeur administratif financier Face à une contrainte financière, matérialisée par des salaires qui représentent « 60 à 75 % de notre budget », la direction souhaite conserver une qualité de service suffisante . « On a peur que notre qualité de service se dégrade pour nos résidents et que les conditions de travail baissent également ».
À lire aussi
Dans l’Orne, un village entier se transforme pour un rendez-vous incontournable Et maintenant, quelles solutions ? Quelles solutions se présentent à l’association ? « Être attentif au budget salarial, avoir une politique d’achat, c’est-à-dire acheter au prix juste, recevoir des aides financières, faire beaucoup d’appels à projets… », énumère la direction.
Des solutions principalement internes, mais un soutien extérieur serait la bienvenue : « on espère les mêmes aides que les Ehpad publics. »
À lire aussi
Spectateur interpellé par la police lors du Tour de France à Flers : ce qu’il s’est passé Un souhait qui correspond à la démarche non lucrative.
On rend un service public à un prix abordable. Il n’y a pas de rendement à avoir, ça ne vient pas entraver notre façon de penser.
Gérald Julie, directeur administratif financier Une vision en adéquation avec le milieu rural concerné : « le coût du privé n’est pas adapté à notre public. Que vont devenir nos résidents si l’on disparaît ? » Une véritable crainte et une responsabilité sur les épaules de l’association.

author: Tamara Hardingham-Gill, CNN
title: Larger cruise ships pose environmental concerns
text:
Cruise ships have doubled in size over the past two decades, a precedent that could lead to even bigger vessels plying our oceans in the future, bringing potential problems, a newly released report has warned.
The largest passenger vessels today are twice as large as they were in 2000, says a study conducted by European clean energy lobby group Transport and Environment (T&E) which warns of the environmental impact of the “rapidly” growing global cruise industry.
The report suggests that the biggest cruise ships setting sail in 2050 could be nearly eight times larger than the infamous Titanic, the largest passenger ship in service when it set sail in 1912 (measuring 269 meters or about 883 feet), if the growth rate continues as it is.
Disney's Wonder cruise ship and Carnival's Fantasy taking to the waters in 2004.
Bruce Weaver/AFP/Getty Images via CNN Newsource “Today’s cruisezillas make the Titanic look like a small fishing boat,” Inesa Ulichina, sustainable shipping officer at T&E, said in a statement.

author: MarketScreener
title: Pope says Ukraine should have 'courage of the white flag' of negotiations - 2024-03-09 | MarketScreener
text:
ROME (Reuters) - Pope Francis has said in an interview that Ukraine should have what he called the courage of the "white flag" and negotiate an end to the war with Russia that followed Moscow's full-scale invasion two years ago and that has killed tens of thousands.
Francis made his comments in an interview recorded last month with Swiss broadcaster RSI, well before Friday's latest offer by Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan to host a summit between Ukraine and Russia to end the war.
Erdogan made the fresh offer after a meeting in Istanbul with his Ukrainian counterpart Volodymyr Zelenskiy. Zelenskiy has said while he wants peace he will not give up any territory.
The Ukrainian leader's own peace plan calls for the withdrawal of Russian troops from all of Ukraine and the restoration of its state borders. The Kremlin has ruled out engaging in peace talks on terms set by Kyiv.
In the interview Francis was asked for his position on a debate between those who say Ukraine should give up as it has not been able to repel Russian forces, and those who say doing so would legitimise actions by the strongest party. The interviewer used the term "white flag" in the question.
"It is one interpretation, that is true," Francis said, according to an advance transcript of the interview and a partial video made available to Reuters on Saturday. It is due to be broadcast on March 20 as part of a new cultural programme.
"But I think that the strongest one is the one who looks at the situation, thinks about the people and has the courage of the white flag, and negotiates," Francis said, adding that talks should take place with the help of international powers.
"The word negotiate is a courageous word. When you see that you are defeated, that things are not going well, you have to have the courage to negotiate," Francis said.
It was believed to be the first time Francis has used terms such as "white flag" or "defeated" in discussing the Ukraine war, although he has spoken in the past about the need for negotiations.
Last year the 87-year-old pope sent a peace envoy, Italian Cardinal Matteo Zuppi, to Kyiv, Moscow and Washington to sound out leaders in those countries.
"One may feel shame," Francis said about negotiating, "but how many dead will it (the war) end up with? (One should) negotiate in time, find a country that can be a mediator," Francis said, mentioning Turkey among the countries that had offered.
"Do not be ashamed of negotiating, before things get worse," said Francis, who has made hundreds of appeals for what he calls "martyred Ukraine". Asked if he was willing to mediate, Francis said "I am here".
In another part of the interview, speaking of the war between Israel and Hamas, Francis said: "Negotiating is never a surrender".
Last month Zelenskiy said that 31,000 Ukrainian soldiers had been killed since the Russian invasion in February 2022 and that tens of thousands of civilians had been killed in the occupied areas of the country.
(Reporting by Philip Pullella; Editing by Frances Kerry)

author: Bruno Laux
title: Deputado questiona repasse do RS à Portela para o Carnaval de 2026
text:
Apoio questionado
Diante da repercussão sobre o apoio financeiro do governo estadual à escola de samba Portela para o Carnaval de 2026, o deputado Rodrigo Lorenzoni (PL) protocolou pedido de informações ao Executivo. No documento enviado ao Piratini, o parlamentar questiona valores já aportados ou previstos, bem como a origem orçamentária desses recursos — se da cultura, do turismo ou do fundo de reconstrução. Em justificativa, o deputado alegou que, diante das perdas causadas pelas enchentes no RS e das dificuldades enfrentadas por hospitais, empresas e famílias, o patrocínio à escola de samba “não parece ser, neste momento, a melhor escolha”.
Dívidas em pauta
Em conversa por telefone, o governador Eduardo Leite dialogou ontem (18) com o ministro da Agricultura, Carlos Fávaro, sobre a situação crítica do endividamento dos produtores rurais do RS. Leite tornou a defender a utilização de recursos do Fundo Social – abastecido com verbas da exploração do pré-sal, inclusive dos royalties da cessão onerosa – além da simplificação dos processos de comprovação de perdas de produtividade por parte dos produtores, como condição para acesso às prorrogações previstas em resolução do Conselho Monetário Nacional. Em resposta à articulação, o chefe ministerial sinalizou que o governo federal deve publicar, nos próximos dias, a criação de um grupo de trabalho voltado à construção de uma solução estruturante para as dívidas do campo.
Apuração de denúncias
A deputada estadual Luciana Genro (PSOL) encaminhou ofício à presidência da AGERGS cobrando providências diante de denúncias envolvendo a CEEE Equatorial. Segundo relatos recebidos pela parlamentar, a concessionária estaria realizando ligações de energia de forma unilateral em comunidades de Porto Alegre, instalando medidores sem consentimento prévio e posteriormente emitindo cobranças retroativas, baseadas em estimativas e sem contrato formal. As queixas se concentram entre famílias em situação de vulnerabilidade social, que também relatam falta de informação sobre como contestar os valores. No documento, Luciana solicita à agência reguladora informações sobre as medidas adotadas para apurar os casos e eventuais descumprimentos contratuais por parte da empresa. A parlamentar também pede a criação de um passo a passo acessível para orientar os consumidores lesados e a ampla divulgação de materiais informativos.
Volta às aulas
O deputado Luciano Silveira (MDB) reuniu-se nesta semana com o vice-governador Gabriel Souza para debater o início do ano letivo em 2026 no RS. O parlamentar propôs que as aulas não retornem no dia 18 de fevereiro, que será na quarta-feira de cinzas, diante dos potenciais prejuízos econômicos para a região do Litoral Norte, além dos transtornos gerados para as famílias que estarão de férias neste período. Em resposta ao pleito, Gabriel se comprometeu a buscar o diálogo com a Secretaria de Educação, para transferir o início das aulas para 23 de fevereiro.
Saúde mental
Os vereadores de Porto Alegre aprovaram nesta quarta-feira a proposta legislativa da vereadora Psicóloga Tanise Sabino (MDB) que institui o Programa Permanente em Saúde Mental, destinado à comunidade das escolas públicas da rede municipal de ensino. A ação trabalhará para garantir o acesso à atenção psicossocial a integrantes do meio, além de distribuir materiais didático-informativos e promover encontros para sensibilizar a comunidade sobre a importância da temática. Tanise propôs também atenção especial à educação permanente de gestores e profissionais da educação na área da saúde mental, capacitando-os a identificar problemas relacionados à questão. Validado pelo Legislativo, o texto segue para sanção do prefeito Sebastião Melo.
Bruno Laux

author: Redacción EC
title: Gustavo Cazonatti confiesa que pasa por el "momento más difícil de su carrera" tras confirmarse grave lesión
text:
Saber más
Sporting Cristal confirmó el último miércoles una noticia que, sin duda, lamenta todo hincha celeste. El mediocampista Gustavo Cazonatti estará fuera de los terrenos de juego por varios meses.
LEE TAMBIÉN:[Erick Noriega: “Sabemos que, por razones de marketing, a la Conmebol quizá le conviene que Boca Juniors esté presente”]
Y es que pese a no tener daño ósea en la rodilla derecha, sí existe compromiso ligamentario y meniscal, por lo que será intervenido quirúrgicamente.
A través de sus redes sociales, el destacado futbolista brasileño se ponunció y compartió su pesar por esta grave lesión sufrida en el partido ante Sport Boys por la Liga 1 Te Apuesto.
“Sin duda, es el momento más difícil de mi carrera, quiero agradecer los mensajes de apoyo que he recibido en los últimos días. No ha sido fácil, pero el cariño de todos me ha hecho sentir bien en este momento tan difícil”, escribió en su cuenta de Instagram.
MIRA:[Néstor Gorosito sobre La Bombonera: “Esto de la cancha es un mito. No pasa nada, para mí es todo sanata”]
“Trabajaré duro para volver lo más pronto posible, y aún más fuerte en la búsqueda de nuestros objetivos. ¡Muchas gracias!“, añadió dirigiéndose al hincha de Sporting Cristal.
Sporting Cristal sufre una dura baja para este inicio de campeonato en el que, además del torneo local, debe competir en la fase de grupos de la Copa Libertadores.
